pages.text: Soup is a kind of hot drink, its type depends on its ingrendients, and it inherits attributes from all of its ingredients. A bowl of soup contains 250 mb of fluid.
Each bowl of soup can contain 3 ingredients max. Soup can be cooked with ediable raw ingredients, and they would become cooked ones after cooking.
Potions can also be added to soups, but double duration and three different kind of potion at most.
